title: Backup - Restore Deleted File
description: An end-user accidentally deleted an important file from a shared network drive and needs it restored from last night's backup.

tasks.description: Identify the file server and the exact path and name of the file that needs to be restored.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician has the full path of the deleted file.

tasks.description: Access the backup system, browse the previous night's backup set for the file server, and locate the file.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician successfully finds the file in the backup archive.

tasks.description: Restore the file to its original location and notify the user that it is available.
tasks.expected_outcome: The file is successfully restored, and the user's issue is resolved.
